channel.title: En Pensent - Chess Art News
channel.description: Latest features, updates, and stories from En Pensent - transforming chess games into stunning generative art.

item.title: Stockfish 17 NNUE Integration
item.description: Real grandmaster-strength analysis with ~3200 ELO engine. Centipawn accuracy, win probability, depth 20+ evaluation. Play against or analyze with the world's strongest open-source engine.
item.content:encoded:
We're excited to announce the integration of Stockfish 17 NNUE into En Pensent!

This brings grandmaster-strength analysis (~3200 ELO) directly to your browser:

  • Centipawn accuracy evaluation
  • Win probability calculations
  • Depth 20+ analysis
  • 5 difficulty levels for play mode

Try it now →

item.title: FEN Position Import/Export
item.description: Import any chess position via FEN notation for instant visualization. Export final positions from any game. Perfect for puzzles, studies, and custom compositions.
item.content:encoded:
FEN (Forsyth-Edwards Notation) support is now live!

You can now:

  • Import any chess position directly
  • Visualize puzzle positions
  • Create art from endgame studies
  • Export positions from your games

Start creating →

item.title: Natural Vision™ Recognition Launched
item.description: Our proprietary pattern recognition technology can now identify any En Pensent print and instantly display its game details, Stockfish analysis, and ownership history.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing Natural Vision™ - our proprietary print recognition technology.

Simply scan any En Pensent print with your phone to:

  • View the complete game replay
  • Access Stockfish analysis
  • See ownership history
  • Verify authenticity

Try the scanner →

item.title: Carlsen in Color Book Pre-Orders Open
item.description: 100 of Magnus Carlsen's greatest games, each with AI-generated haiku poetry and Stockfish annotations. Limited first edition of 1,000 copies with exclusive collector's box.
item.content:encoded:
Pre-orders are now open for "Carlsen in Color" - our flagship coffee table book.

Features:

  • 100 of Magnus Carlsen's greatest games
  • AI-generated haiku poetry for each game
  • Stockfish annotations
  • Limited edition of 1,000 copies
  • Exclusive collector's box

Pre-order now →

item.title: Vision Marketplace Goes Live
item.description: Trade, collect, and discover unique chess visualizations. Built-in wallet system, royalty tracking, and secure ownership transfers.
item.content:encoded:
The Vision Marketplace is officially live!

Features include:

  • Buy and sell unique Visions
  • Built-in wallet system
  • 5% perpetual creator royalties
  • Secure ownership transfers
  • Price history tracking

Explore the marketplace →

item.title: AI Poetry & Heatmap Analysis
item.description: Every famous game features unique AI-generated poetry and Gemini-powered strategic insights. Visualize pressure zones, piece activity, and tactical patterns.
item.content:encoded:
We've added AI-powered enhancements to every visualization:

  • Unique haiku poetry for each game
  • Gemini-powered strategic insights
  • Pressure zone heatmaps
  • Piece activity visualization
  • Tactical pattern recognition

Create your first Vision →

item.title: Premium Framing Options
item.description: Museum-quality frames now available: Walnut, Matte Black, Natural Oak, and Gold Gilded. Ships worldwide with white-glove service.
item.content:encoded:
Elevate your chess art with our new premium framing options:

  • Walnut - classic warmth
  • Matte Black - modern elegance
  • Natural Oak - Scandinavian style
  • Gold Gilded - gallery presence

All frames feature museum-quality glass and archival mounting.

Order a framed print →

item.title: Live Play Mode Released
item.description: Play chess directly on En Pensent against opponents or Stockfish AI (5 difficulty levels). Watch your artwork generate in real-time as you make moves.
item.content:encoded:
Live Play Mode is here! Create art while you play:

  • Play against Stockfish AI (5 difficulty levels)
  • Challenge friends online
  • Watch art generate in real-time
  • Automatic game saving

Start playing →

item.title: Education Fund Initiative
item.description: A portion of every sale now contributes to chess education programs in underserved communities worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
We're proud to announce the En Pensent Chess Education Fund.

2% of all platform revenue supports:

  • Chess programs in underserved schools
  • Youth tournament sponsorships
  • Chess equipment donations
  • Coaching scholarships

Learn more →

item.title: 75+ Historic Games Library
item.description: Explore and visualize legendary games spanning 500+ years of chess history, from Ruy López to Gukesh's 2024 championship victory.
item.content:encoded:
Our Famous Games Library now includes 75+ legendary games:

  • The Immortal Game (1851)
  • The Opera Game (1858)
  • Kasparov vs. Deep Blue
  • Carlsen's World Championship victories
  • Gukesh's 2024 championship game

Explore the library →

item.title: Visionary Membership Launch
item.description: Premium tier unlocked: unlimited downloads, HD exports, Stockfish analysis, exclusive palettes, priority printing, and early access to new features.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing Visionary Membership - our premium tier:

  • Unlimited HD downloads
  • Animated GIF exports
  • Stockfish analysis on all games
  • Exclusive color palettes
  • Priority print processing
  • Early access to new features
  • Marketplace listing privileges

Become a Visionary →

item.title: 16 Curated Color Palettes
item.description: From Japanese minimalism to Art Deco grandeur — each palette transforms your games into distinct visual experiences.
item.content:encoded:
We've launched 16 curated color palettes:

  • Japanese - serene minimalism
  • Art Deco - geometric grandeur
  • Monochrome - timeless elegance
  • Neon - vibrant energy
  • And 12 more unique themes...

Each palette completely transforms how your game visualization looks and feels.

Explore palettes →
